item.title: Automatic transcription software to transcribe like a pro
item.description: Chances are that if you are working on a linguistics project, you might have to transcribe audio recordings in order to analyze them. Transcribing can be a deadly boring process ðŸ˜©, especially if you have many files or if you are dealing with speakers of non-standard dialects/varieties. However, recent advancements in automatic speech recognition (ASR) have led to the development of very cool software that can help you speed up the transcription process.
